title: A specialty-coffee trend is brewing in India. And Blue Tokai is at the helm of this change.
text:
Stirring up the coffee-drinking culture of the country, there is a rise of new-age coffee shops that are not going for the masses. One such brand is Blue Tokai, which is introducing Indians to the nuances of the coffee — say, the difference between Arabica and Robusta — and also competing with Starbucks.
